programme.title: Barbershop
programme.desc: The owner of a popular barbershop considers selling the place to a loan shark who wants to convert it into a strip club.

programme.title: Mind Your Business
programme.desc: After months of preparation, the Williams family is finally ready for the grand opening of their event space until an untimely oversight forces them to use their differences to pull it together at the last minute.

programme.title: Mind Your Business
programme.desc: A building inspector's grudge with Henry threatens the future of the family business, while Lucille finds herself in hot water for abruptly pulling the kids out of school. Michael Colyar Guest Stars.

programme.title: Mind Your Business
programme.desc: A college class reunion makes Alfonso second guess the path of life he's chosen. Aaliyah sees her ex-husband for the first time since their untimely divorce. Wesley Jonathan and Robert Ri'chard Guest Star.

programme.title: Mind Your Business
programme.desc: When Kimberly's parents do a pop-up visit, an unexpected storm traps everyone inside, resulting in Alfonso settling the score with his father-in-law. Howard Hewitt Guest Stars.

programme.title: Mind Your Business
programme.desc: When Alfonso's back injury forces him out of commission, Kimberly steps into the event space. But when a double booking disaster threatens to unravel it all, they race against time to keep their clients from discovering the chaos!

programme.title: Mind Your Business
programme.desc: When Aaliyah's sharp attitude disrupts her workplace, Mia plays matchmaker by signing her up for a speed dating event. Aaliyah's journey to find love takes a surprising twist and AJ's luxury car dream leads to a risky scheme.

programme.title: Mind Your Business
programme.desc: Famous playwright, The Ivory Hill, hosts her production at Lucille's, but when an accident leaves Ivory unable to carry on, the family must decide who will fill her shoes. Meanwhile, Alfonso tries to secure a grant for the business .

programme.title: Mind Your Business
programme.desc: Alfonso must make a major career decision while Lucielle's son comes home with a big confession.

programme.title: Someone They Knew with Tamron Hall
programme.desc: Successful Atlanta entrepreneur Lance Herndon usually got what he wanted, but when he is found bludgeoned to death in his waterbed, it appeared he got more than he could handle, possibly due to a business deal gone wrong or a girlfriend's revenge.

programme.title: Someone They Knew with Tamron Hall
programme.desc: When an unknown assailant guns down sheriff-elect Derwin Brown shortly after winning his election, investigators suspect a political assassination, only to instead uncover an extensive trail of corruption.

programme.desc: Aviesha fears that her daughter Eryonah's wayward tendencies are going to land her in jail or dead; for 18 years, Roshard has endured numerous stories about another man being his son's father.

programme.desc: A young house-sitter insists that a homeowner said she could throw a party; a motorist backs into a friend's car and blames the car's color for blending into the background.

programme.title: Couples Court With the Cutlers
programme.desc: A Florida man confesses to cheating 32 years ago, but his wife suspects he's still cheating and will end their 37-year marriage if the polygraph results prove he's guilty.

programme.desc: After 13 years of marriage, an Oklahoma woman comes to court, and she is worried that her minister husband is preaching more than just the word.

programme.title: Couples Court With the Cutlers
programme.desc: A former college football player denies his wife's allegations that he cheats to punish her for ruining his chance at a football career.

programme.title: Couples Court With the Cutlers
programme.desc: The Cutlers call on a former expert military interrogator to get answers for a Kansas woman who suspects her husband of cheating with their neighbor.

programme.desc: A Michigan woman brings her boyfriend to court to prove he is the biological father of her 2-month-old fraternal twins.

programme.desc: Virgil's cousin is the prime suspect in a robbery-murder, complicating Virgil's attempts to reconcile his aunt with the family.
